name: health-screen-app
description: Symptom self-monitoring app for the University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison

scripts.postinstall: npm rebuild node-sass && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:dev: npx webpack --config config/webpack.config.js --env.NODE_ENV=development && ncp src/js/serviceworker.js public/serviceworker.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npx webpack --config config/webpack.config.js --env.NODE_ENV=production && ncp src/js/serviceworker.js public/serviceworker.js && NODE_ENV=production npx eleventy --config=_eleventy.js

author: University Marketing
